name: Propulsion (itch)
description:
In this verticality-focused 3D platformer, use propulsion to fly through the world in pursuit of collectible crystals. But watch out: propulsion is limited by power, and when power runs out, the game ends. Play 3 levels with replayable challenge to collect all the crystals before being grounded.

Propulsion is a game developed in Unreal Engine 4, created by designer Chris George. It can be played with mouse and keyboard or a controller, though a mouse is required for menu navigation.
